headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID. Pass one of the advertiser IDs returned via advertiser_ids from /oauth2/access_token/ .

parameters.name: discovery_type
parameters.description: The type of discovery item. Currently, we only support HASHTAG .

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: Location code. Default value: US . See Location code for the supported values.

parameters.name: category_name
parameters.description: The name of the hashtag industry category. To learn about the enum values, see Hashtag industry category names . You can pass either a level-1 category name or a level-2 category name. Default value: ALL . Example: FOOD_AND_BEVERAGE . If you pass category_name and industry_id at the same time, industry_id will be ignored.

parameters.name: date_range
parameters.description: The timeframe in which the items have been popular. Enum values: 1DAY : last 1 day. 7DAY : last 7 days. 30DAY : last 30 days. 120DAY : last 120 days. Default value: 7DAY .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: filter_info
fields.description: Filtering information that is specified in your request. If you don't include the following parameters in the request, we will return the default values for them, which are date_range = 7DAY , country_code = US , industry_id = ALL , and category_name = ALL .

fields.name: date_range
fields.description: The timeframe in which the items have been popular. Enum values: 1DAY : last 1 day. 7DAY : last 7 days. 30DAY : last 30 days. 120DAY : last 120 days.

fields.name: country_code
fields.description: Location code. See Location code for the enum values. Example: DE .

fields.name: category_name
fields.description: The name of the hashtag industry category. To learn about the enum values, see Hashtag industry category names . Example: FOOD_AND_BEVERAGE .

fields.name: rank_position
fields.description: Current rank position of the hashtag among hashtags within the same category ( category_name ) or industry ( industry_id ) in the selected region ( country_code ). Example: 100 .

fields.name: rank_change
fields.description: The change in rank position compared to the rank in the last time period. A positive rank_change indicates an increase in rank. For example, if the rank position shifts from 5 to 1, rank_change will be 4 . A negative rank_change indicates a decrease in rank. For example, if the rank position shifts from 1 to 5, rank_change will be -4 . A rank_change of 0 indicates no changes in rank. A rank_change marked as NEW indicates that the hashtag was not present in the top 200 ranking list in the last time period.

fields.name: views
fields.description: The number of views for related videos that feature this hashtag in the selected region and timeframe. Note : If you fail to specify country_code or date_range in your request, we will return data based on the default values for these two parameters, which are date_range = 7DAY or country_code = US . Example: 134333716.

fields.name: views_global_lifetime
fields.description: The number of views for related videos that feature this hashtag, globally and across their whole lifetime. Example: 91639649280.

fields.name: posts
fields.description: The number of posts for related videos that feature this hashtag in the selected region and timeframe. Note : If you fail to specify country_code or date_range in your request, we will return data based on the default values for these two parameters, which are date_range = 7DAY or country_code = US . Example: 21856.

fields.name: posts_global_lifetime
fields.description: The number of posts for related videos that feature this hashtag, globally and across their whole lifetime. Example: 7846729.

fields.name: top_country_list
fields.description: The location codes of the top five locations in the world where this hashtag is most popular. To learn about the location that a location code represents, see Location code . Example: ["US", "GB", "PH", "CA", "DE"] .

fields.name: trending_history
fields.description: The historical ranking data for the hashtag, spanning up to the past 30 days..

fields.name: date
fields.description: Date, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD . Example: 2024-01-01 .

fields.name: rank_position_daily
fields.description: The rank position of the hashtag among hashtags across all categories or industries in the selected region ( country_code ) on the date. Example: 73 . Note : If the hashtag does not perform well compared to the last time period, the hashtag will not be considered a trending hashtag and the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: views_daily
fields.description: The number of views for related videos that feature this hashtag in the selected region ( country_code ) on the date. Example: 21215985. Note : If the daily views are less than 1,000, the value of this field will be null.
